text: Georg Maier (27 September 1941 – 1 January 2021) was a German actor and theatre director. He was born in Grünwald, Nazi Germany. He was known for his roles in Familie Meier (1983) and Irgendwie und Sowieso (1986). Maier died on 1 January 2021 in Munich at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German stage actors Category:German television actors Category:German theatre directors
title: Georg Maier
